name: Moto Racer 3d With Traffic
description:
Moto Traffic Racer -Free Racing Games

Ride Your Bike As Fast As you can..
Download this game And Go for the Bike Race Chase the traffics making a good high-score. and challenge your friends and family.more score.Choose your favourite location from the different types of location and enjoy your ride on that awesome Location. earn coins and unlock the super sport Bikes,there is lot's of bikes and locations included in this game.

=> HD Graphics & to play with a Tilt or button.

=> Perfect control

=> different and attractive location

if you Like this game then Rate Us and Share Us.
